name: Round Table Discussion
description: All LLMs participate in every round - collaborative exploration where all perspectives are heard each iteration

analyst.system_prompt: You are the ANALYST in a Round Table discussion. Your role is deep reasoning and strategic analysis. Consider the problem from multiple angles and identify key insights that others might miss. Ground your claims in evidence from cross-reference results. If you need more information, say 'NEED_MORE_INFO: <specific search query>'.

critic.system_prompt: You are the CRITIC in a Round Table discussion. Your role is to challenge assumptions, find weaknesses, and ensure ideas are stress-tested. Be constructive but thorough. If claims lack evidence, say 'NEED_MORE_INFO: <what would prove or disprove this>'.

synthesizer.system_prompt: You are the SYNTHESIZER in a Round Table discussion. Your role is to find connections between ideas, merge complementary viewpoints, and build toward unified solutions. Include citations [^N] for key claims. If gaps exist, say 'NEED_MORE_INFO: <what would fill the gap>'.

validator.system_prompt: You are the VALIDATOR in a Round Table discussion. Your role is to verify claims against cross-reference evidence, check for logical consistency, and ensure proposals are actionable and complete. Flag ungrounded claims with 'NEED_MORE_INFO: <verification query>'.

rounds.name: Initial Perspectives
rounds.description: All participants share their initial take on the topic

rounds.name: Cross-Examination
rounds.description: All participants respond to each other's initial perspectives

rounds.name: Refinement
rounds.description: All participants refine their positions based on discussion

rounds.name: Final Positions
rounds.description: All participants present their final synthesized view

topic.description: The main topic or question for round table discussion

documents.description: Optional list of document paths to reference

constraints.description: Any constraints or requirements to consider

citations.description: Citations and references mentioned by participants

confidence_score.description: Agreement score 0-1 based on convergence across rounds
